mapper.select: select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM from MEM_TBL M limit 10 offset #{offset};
select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_STAT, M.ACVT, F.FILE_PATH from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};
mapper.update: update MEM_TBL M LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_TBL F ON M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX SET M.MEM_PWD = hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key})), M.MEM_NICK = #{mem_nick}, M.MEM_NM = #{mem_nm}, F.FILE_PATH = #{file_path} where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};
mapper.select: select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_STAT, F.FILE_PATH from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} and M.ACVT = 1 and M.MEM_PWD = hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key}));
